description: Standard table definitions for lending protocols.

tables.label: Pools
tables.description: List of pools in the lending protocol.

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

creation_block_number.description: The block this pool was created in.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block that this pool was created in.

underlying_token_address.description: The contract address of the underlying token.

underlying_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the underlying token.

receipt_token_address.description: The contract address of the receipt token.

receipt_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the receipt token.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

pool_type.description: The type of the pool (collateral_only, isolated, supply_pool, cdp).

tables.label: Position Snapshot
tables.description: Snapshot of user positions in the lending protocol.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

underlying_token_address.description: The contract address of the underlying token.

underlying_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the underlying token.

user_address.description: The address of the user who has the position.

supplied_amount.description: The amount supplied by the user in the underlying token, decimal normalized.

borrowed_amount.description: The amount borrowed by the user in the underlying token, decimal normalized.

collateral_amount.description: (Optional) The amount of collateral-only tokens of this asset, decimal normalized.

collateral_amount_usd.description: (Optional) The amount of collateral-only tokens in USD.

tables.label: Pool Snapshot
tables.description: Snapshot of the pool's state in the lending protocol.

block_date.description: The timestamp truncated (ie, YYYY-MM-DD format for daily snapshots and YYYY-MM-DD HH:00:00 for hourly snapshots).

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

underlying_token_address.description: The contract address of the underlying token.

underlying_token_symbol.description: The symbol of the underlying token.

underlying_token_price_usd.description: (Optional) The token price of the underlying asset in USD.

available_amount.description: The amount of token's available to borrow (liquidity or net supply or supply - borrow).

available_amount_usd.description: (Optional) The available amount of token's in this pool in USD.

supplied_amount.description: The total amount of the underlying token supplied in this pool, decimal normalized.

non_recursive_supplied_amount.description: The amount of non recursive supply in this pool, in the underlying token, decimal normalized. This is an aggregation of all of the user's net supply of this asset.

collateral_amount.description: (Optional) The amount of collateral only tokens in this pool.

collateral_amount_usd.description: (Optional) The amount of collateral only tokens in the pool.

collateral_factor.description: The collateral factor of the pool (defined as a decimal percentage, between 0-100).

supply_index.description: The supply index of the pool.

supply_apr.description: The current annual percentage rate for supplied amount, as a decimal percentage.

borrowed_amount.description: The amount of underlying tokens borrowed from this pool in the underlying token, decimal normalized.

borrow_index.description: The borrow index of the pool.

borrow_apr.description: The current annual percentage rate for borrow, as a decimal percentage.

total_fees_usd.description: (Optional) The total revenue or fees accrued in this pool during the given snapshot period (ie, user_fees_usd + protocol_fees_usd = total_fees_usd).

user_fees_usd.description: (Optional) The portion of total revenue or fees accrued to users of the protocol during the given snapshot period.

protocol_fees_usd.description: (Optional) The portion of total revenue or fees accrued to protocol during the given snapshot period.

tables.label: Events
tables.description: All user events in the lending protocol (ie, Deposit, Withdrawal, Borrow, Repay, Liquidation, Flashloan)

chain_id.description: The standard id of the chain.

block_number.description: The block number of the trade.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

user_address.description: The address that initiates the transaction (ie, the transaction signer).

taker_address.description: The address that receives the output of the event (ie, account that receives aTokens in an Aave Deposit).

pool_address.description: The contract address of the pool.

token_address.description: The address of the underlying token that was interacted with (ie, USDC and not aUSDC in Aave).

amount.description: The amount of token_address transacted, decimal normalized.

amount_usd.description: The amount of token_address transacted, in USD.

event_type.description: The type of lending event, corresponds to the action taken by the user (ie, deposit, withdrawal, borrow, repay, liquidation, flashloan).

tables.label: Incentive Claim Data
tables.description: Transactional data on user level incentives claimed data.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.

user_address.description: The address of the user who claimed the incentives.

claimed_token_address.description: The smart contract address of the claimed token.

amount.description: The amount of the token claimed, decimal normalized.

amount_usd.description: The amount of claimed tokens in USD.

other_incentive_usd.description: (Optional) Any incentives outside of the claimed token, in this transaction, summed up in USD terms.
